head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROBINSON, L. DONALD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROBINSON, L. DONALD

block.p: ROBINSON--L. Donald. The Board of Directors of 190 East 72nd Corp. mourns the passing of Don Robinson, a valued Board member and resident of Tower East. His wise counsel and concern for our building will be sorely missed. We express our condolences to his wife Ellen and family. Jay G. Axelrod, President
